title: Homepage Banner Carousel Functionality
description: Verify that the dynamic banner carousel on the homepage displays featured products and promotions, auto-scrolls correctly, and user controls like next/previous buttons work as expected.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage
Check the banner carousel is visible and contains featured products and promotions
Observe the carousel auto-scroll for at least 10 seconds
Validate the carousel auto-scrolls to next banners at regular intervals
Click the next button on the carousel
Verify the banner changes to the next item on user click
Click the previous button on the carousel
Verify the banner changes to the previous item on user click
Resize the browser window and check responsiveness
Validate carousel layout adapts correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop views

title: Three-Level Hierarchical Product Browsing
description: Ensure that users can browse products through a three-level category hierarchy, and all category links fetch correct products.

steps.description: Navigate to the categories page
Verify the presence of top-level categories
Click a top-level category to reveal second-level subcategories
Verify correct display of second-level categories
Click a second-level category to reveal third-level categories or products
Verify that third-level categories or product listings appear accordingly
Select a third-level category or product listing
Confirm the correct products for that category are displayed
Attempt to navigate to a non-existent category via URL manipulation
Check that a graceful error or not found page is shown

title: Real-time Search with Suggestions
description: Validate that the search bar provides real-time suggestions matching user input and returns accurate product search results.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage or any page with search bar
Type a partial product name or keyword in the search input
Validate real-time suggestions appear below the search bar
Select a suggestion from the list
Verify the product details or product listing page for the selected item is opened
Type a random string that matches no products
Check that the search suggests no results message or no suggestions

title: User Authentication: Successful Login
description: Check that users can successfully log in with valid credentials and that session is maintained.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid username/email and password
Click the login button
Confirm successful login and redirection to user dashboard or homepage
Verify session data is set and maintained across pages

title: User Authentication: Failed Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure login fails with incorrect credentials and proper error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid username/email or password
Click the login button
Check the login is rejected with appropriate error message
Confirm no session is created and user remains on login page

title: User Registration with Valid Input
description: Verify a new user can successfully sign up using valid data and receive confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page
Fill the registration form with valid name, email, password, and other required fields
Submit the registration form
Confirm account creation success message or redirection to login page
Attempt to login with the newly created credentials
Verify login is successful

title: Password Recovery Process
description: Ensure a user can reset password through the 'forgot password' flow and update password successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the forgot password page
Submit a registered email address for password recovery
Verify confirmation message indicating password reset instructions sent
Simulate following the password reset link and entering a new valid password
Confirm password update success
Log in with the new password
Validate successful login with new password

title: Shopping Cart: Add, Update, and Remove Items
description: Validate that users can add products to cart, update item quantities, remove items, and that changes persist across sessions.

steps.description: Navigate to a product listing or product detail page
Add a product to the shopping cart
Verify the cart icon reflects updated item count
Go to the shopping cart page
Update the quantity of an item
Confirm the item quantity updates correctly and price is recalculated
Remove an item from the cart
Ensure the item is removed and cart updates accordingly
Log out and log back in
Validate the shopping cart contents persist between sessions

title: Checkout Process Validations and Order Placement
description: Verify that the checkout process validates shipping info, allows payment selection, processes payments securely, and displays order confirmation.

steps.description: Add items to cart and proceed to the checkout page
Fill out shipping information with valid data
Ensure that no validation errors appear for valid data
Choose a payment method and enter required payment details
Submit the order
Verify that order is processed and user is redirected to order confirmation (thank-you) page with order details
Try submitting checkout with missing or invalid shipping info
Check that appropriate validation messages prevent submission
Attempt to simulate payment failure
Confirm that failure is handled gracefully with informative message and option to retry

title: User Dashboard: Profile Management and Order History
description: Ensure user can view and update profile information and see accurate order history details in their dashboard.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the user dashboard
Verify profile information is displayed accurately
Edit profile fields and save changes
Confirm that updates persist after page reload or new login
View the order history section
Validate that past orders are displayed with correct details such as order date, items, status, and total
Click on an order to view detailed information
Confirm order detail page loads with correct content

title: Responsive Design Verification Across Devices
description: Test that application pages render and function correctly on mobile phones, tablets, and desktop devices with accurate layout and navigation.

steps.description: Open the homepage on a desktop browser
Verify layout is correct and navigation works
Resize browser window to tablet dimensions
Validate that layout adjusts appropriately without element overlap or cutoff
Open the application on a mobile device or emulate mobile viewport
Confirm the UI is optimized, menus are accessible, and all interactive components function correctly

title: API Data Integrity and Error Handling
description: Validate that Next.js API routes return correct data structures for banner and category mappings and handle errors gracefully.

steps.description: Call the /api/banner endpoint
Check that the response contains valid banner data structure with expected fields
Call the /api/seeall endpoint with valid and invalid category parameters
Verify response returns correct category mapping data for valid parameters
Ensure error responses with proper HTTP status and messages for invalid parameters

title: Session Management and Expiration
description: Test that user sessions are managed securely, expire appropriately after inactivity, and that expired sessions require re-authentication.

steps.description: Log in successfully to the user account
Confirm session token or cookie is created
Remain inactive for session timeout duration
Attempt to perform authenticated actions after timeout
Verify session expired and user is prompted to login again

title: Security: JWT Authentication and HTTPS Enforcement
description: Verify that JWT authentication is implemented correctly and all communications enforce HTTPS to protect user data and privacy.

steps.description: Attempt login and intercept token returned by the API
Confirm token structure follows JWT standard
Attempt accessing protected routes with and without valid JWT
Check that only requests with valid JWT are authorized
Try accessing the application using HTTP instead of HTTPS
Validate that non-secure HTTP requests are redirected or blocked

title: Performance Testing: Page Load and Response Times
description: Ensure homepage loads within 3 seconds, subsequent navigations load under 1 second, and overall uptime and error rates meet SLA.

steps.description: Access the homepage from various devices and network speeds
Verify homepage fully loads within 3 seconds
Navigate to product categories, product detail pages, and cart pages repeatedly
Confirm page navigations complete within 1 second
Monitor uptime over extended period using automated monitoring tools
Validate uptime is at least 99.9% and error rates remain below 0.1%

title: Input Validation and Sanitization
description: Test all user input fields across the application to prevent injection attacks or invalid data submission.

steps.description: Input scripts, SQL commands, and invalid special characters into form fields (login, signup, shipping info, search)
Ensure input is sanitized and no malicious script execution or invalid submission occurs
Submit forms with missing required fields and invalid formats
Check appropriate error messages and prevention of submission
